pullRequest.title: POST /login implementation with integration tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Validate user login credentials and redirect to consent page if login credentials are valid.
Change the user account status to ACCOUNT_LOCKED if login attempts exceeds max invalid login attempts. Replace the current password with temporary password and send an email.

nodes.bodyText: I suggest making a separate constant here instead of hard code value, and noting that the measurement of time is in seconds.
Replace 5 with a constant MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS or something similar

I would move updating loginAttempts to before the if statement block, and have the condition be loginAttempts > appConfig.getMaxInvalidLoginAttempts() - it will behave the same way but logically, looking at it the code it would make more sense.
